channel.title: regexp on INFINI Pizza

item.title: Regexp query
item.description: Regexp query # Returns documents that contain terms matching a regular expression. A regular expression is a way to match patterns in data using placeholder characters, called operators. For a list of operators supported by the regexp query, see Regular expression syntax. Examples # The following search returns documents where the org.id field contains any term that begins with in and ends with y. The .* operators match any characters of any length, including no characters.
